Adventure Helper: All right. To sum up a minute. You must destroy Splendor Eyes , Splendor Claw , Splendor Lightning , Splendor Blade , Wise Splendor , Apprentice Pilgrim , page's Pilgrim , Angry Splendor , Splendor Ghost , Splendor Pilgrim , Splendor Winner , Splendor Avenger , Splendor Wrangler , Splendor Warrior Alliance , Splendor Printing , Crowned Splendor , Judge Fire , Judge of Light , Fang of Splendor , Howling Splendor and Splendor Arbiter , collect 20 piece of Remnant Ash and take them High Priest Agripel in Rune . To make the task time for you to go to the Valley of Saints. You understand? Long live the adventure!
